summary: Main theme and Exploration replacement music by Mimi Page, corrected the uninstall path please download this read me
descriptionHtml:
Mimi Page amazing musician and songstress and fan of Skyrim has done it again. Her cover of \"Secunda\" is simply breathtaking

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gmrrrc0Bir4

She has allowed me to post a VERY high quality audio version of her absolutely Haunting rendition of \"Secunda\" for use in the game. I could listen to this all day but decided to release it in two versions and both may be used together without conflict. First in the actual in game music, it simply replaces the original when exploring at night. The second version is to change the Main Theme on the title screen, when continuing or loading the game.
The volume levels are as follow;
exploration, extremely close to the original, I didn\'t want the transition to be loud, so the volume is the same
main theme, everyone likes this loud so i increased it by 6dB from the original the maximum i could go without clipping.

My immense gratitude for Mimi first for making this chilling song and for allowing me to use in game.

Mimi, just keep making more beautiful stuff!
author: gloomfrost
